attributes.action: Bring a change in the law so in terms of penalties as car-jacking (theft of a car from its owner regardless of whether the owner is in the vehicle or simple close by but attempting to prevent the theft either by direct intervention or a simple act of trying to call the police) carries a minimum sentence recommendation consummate with murder /attempted murder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In recent years the country has seen a rise in the number of car-jacking incidents with a number tragically resulting in the loss of life. Even the opportunist makes a conscious decision of a willingness to steal long before any theft so all these crimes have a degree of premeditation.

In terms of penalties as car-jacking (theft of a car from its owner regardless of whether the owner is in the vehicle or simple close by but attempting to prevent the theft either by direct intervention or a simple act of trying to call the police) has led to loss of life it should carry a minimum sentence recommendation consummate with murder /attempted murder. 

Such sentencing should be irrespective as of any other charges brought relating to the act including those of violent acts against individual victims of the crime.

A clear signal needs to be sent out to criminals that car-jacking is a crime that will not be tolerated and that offenders will be removed from society for a lengthy period of rehabilitation.
